Topic.Title: Please Help. Problem with creating textbook in danish.!

Posts.EditableText:
I have fallen completely in love with Quest and have been using the gamebook option for a while now. But have decided to give textbook a go. unfortunately it turns out when using Danish language it has some problems running the game. I get at message saying "failed loading template "remove" dont exist.

for the record i am a total newbie in the whole code/source writing world. so any visual or complete walkthrough would be greatly appreciated.

Best Regards from B-wise.
Posts.HTML:
I have fallen completely in love with Quest and have been using the gamebook option for a while now. But have decided to give textbook a go. unfortunately it turns out when using Danish language it has some problems running the game. Posts.EditableText: Yes, there are several entries in the english template file that are missing in the danish language file. I think all the language files must be checked for this problem. Without them you get the errors
Posts.HTML: Yes, there are several entries in the english template file that are missing in the danish language file. I think all the language files must be checked for this problem. Without them you get the errors
